problem_summary_simple: Check if a pattern with a single wildcard '*' can be a substring of a given string.
problem_summary_technical: Splits the pattern by '*' and uses KMP to find occurrences of the prefix and suffix in the string.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into matching the parts of the pattern before and after the '*'.
The KMP algorithm is efficient for finding occurrences of a pattern within a text.
The '*' can match zero or more characters, so the KMP search for the suffix must start after the found prefix.
